item.title: Chinese BBQ Pork
item.description: by B Ingredients Yields ~1-3 lbs Ingredient Amount Pork shoulder, cut into slabs 1-3 lbs Brown Sugar 3 Tbsp Honey 3 Tbsp Chinese 5-Spice 1.5 tsp Shaoxing Rice Wine 2 Tbsp Soy Sauce 1 Tbsp Hoisin Sauce 2 Tbsp (+1 if no Bean Curd) Red or Black Bean Curd 1 Tbsp Sesame Oil 1 Tbsp Salt 2 Tbsp Preparation Mix brown sugar, 5-spice, shaoxing rice wine, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, bean curd, sesame oil, and sea salt together in a bowl.
